title: Nivaldo (footballer, born June 1988)
text:
Nivaldo Rodrigues Ferreira (born 22 June 1988), known as Nivaldo, is a Brazilian <a href="association%20football">football</a> midfielder and striker plays for <a href="SC%20Chaika%20Petropavlivska%20Borshchahivka">Chaika Petropavlivska Borshchahivka</a>.
Career.
Club.
On 16 August 2012, Nivaldo played on trial for <a href="FC%20Ufa">FC Ufa</a> reserve team. In July 2013, Nivaldo joined <a href="FC%20Sibir%20Novosibirsk">Sibir Novosibirsk</a>, going on to make his debut for them in the <a href="Russian%20National%20Football%20League">Russian Football League</a> against FC Ufa. On 14 August 2014, Nivaldo signed for <a href="FC%20Luch-Energiya%20Vladivostok">Luch-Energiya Vladivostok</a>. Little over two-years later, on 25 August 2016, Nivaldo signed a one-year contract with <a href="FC%20Yenisey%20Krasnoyarsk">Yenisey Krasnoyarsk</a>. Nivaldo was released by Yenisey on 31 January 2017.
Lokomotiv Tashkent.
On 1 February 2018, Nivaldo signed on loan for <a href="Lokomotiv%20Tashkent%20FK">Lokomotiv Tashkent</a> until 30 June 2018. Nivaldo returned to <a href="FC%20Dinamo%20Brest">Dinamo Brest</a> on 25 June 2018.
SC Chaika.
In summer 2021 he moved to <a href="SC%20Chaika%20Petropavlivska%20Borshchahivka">SC Chaika</a>, in <a href="Ukrainian%20Second%20League">Ukrainian Second League</a> and on 14 July 2021 he scored two goals for <a href="SC%20Chaika%20Petropavlivska%20Borshchahivka">SC Chaika</a> in the friendly match against <a href="FC%20Chernihiv">FC Chernihiv</a> in <a href="Plysky">Plysky</a> ended 3-0. On 25 July was made his debut with the new team in <a href="Ukrainian%20Second%20League">Ukrainian Second League</a> in the season <a href="2021-22%20Ukrainian%20Second%20League">2021-22</a> against <a href="FSC%20Bukovyna%20Chernivtsi">Bukovyna Chernivtsi</a>. On 18 August 2021 he made his debut in <a href="Ukrainian%20Cup">Ukrainian Cup</a> for the Second preliminary round, against <a href="FC%20Chernihiv">FC Chernihiv</a> in the season <a href="2021%E2%80%9322%20Ukrainian%20Cup">2021–22</a>. The match was ended 1-1 and into the penalty Nivaldo scored by penalty but the team lost and couldn't get into the Third preliminary round.
Personal life.
Nivaldo is married to Ukrainian Tennis player, <a href="Anna%20Karavayeva">Anna Karavayeva</a>, with the couple having two children, Alexander and Sofia.
